mapper.select: select * from record where UID = #{UID} AND Difficulty = #{Difficulty} AND Sum = #{Sum}
mapper.insert: insert into record (UID, Difficulty, Sum, Max, Mintime) values (#{UID}, #{Difficulty}, #{Sum}, #{Max}, #{Mintime})
mapper.select: SELECT UID, total_questions, correct_questions, accuracy_rate, consecutive_days, last_study_date, create_time, update_time FROM user_quiz_stats WHERE UID = #{UID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_quiz_stats ( UID, total_questions, correct_questions, accuracy_rate, consecutive_days, last_study_date ) VALUES ( #{UID}, #{totalQuestions}, #{correctQuestions}, #{accuracyRate}, #{consecutiveDays}, #{lastStudyDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user_quiz_stats SET total_questions = #{totalQuestions}, correct_questions = #{correctQuestions}, accuracy_rate = #{accuracyRate}, consecutive_days = #{consecutiveDays}, last_study_date = #{lastStudyDate}, update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE UID = #{UID}
